name: Rejuvenate
story_text: You reshape the flow of time in the target's body to return it to an earlier state.
effect:
Choose two of the following effects:
- The target can spend any number of Recoveries.
- The target gains 1 of their Heroic Resource, and can end any effects on them that are ended by a saving throw or that end at the end of their turn.
- The target gains 2 surges, and gains a +3 bonus to speed until the end of the encounter.
special_effect: Strained: You and the target both permanently grow visibly younger (the equivalent of 20 human years, to the minimum of an 18-year-old). Additionally, you are weakened and slowed (save ends).
